name: Otherworld
description:
-OTHERWORLD-

Immerse yourself into a high speed, obstacle filled world while collecting powers and credits to gain high scores!

FEATURES

* Beautiful graphics
* 3 worlds (more to come!)
* Tons of obstacles
* 5 different power-ups
* 10 ships to unlock
* Infinite gameplay
* a ton of smiles and adventures ;)

HOW TO PLAY

Simply touch the left and right side of the screen to dodge your ship left and right.

Become part of the #kellersquad on Instagram!

Follow the legendary Kellan, the man behind @kellansworld on instagram!
